resources.string: On this screen you can see relevant data about your operation.
On this screen you can see all your saved maps. To add a new map press the add button on the bottom right corner.
Set the bounds of your map by applying a long press on the vertices of your area.
Click on the waveform graph to set the red line above the noise. Also set the minimal number of points to register a peak.
Place the detector far from any radioactive sources while it acquires background noise. Wait at least 10 minutes.
